How to assess learning and development companies

Employee Training
Share:

Partnering with professional training and coaching companies can be highly beneficial for organizations as they navigate the evolving landscape of work. The best training and development companies help businesses develop their employees' skill sets, enabling them to stay competitive and adapt to changing demands.

Top training and development companies offer customized solutions, recognizing that each organization has unique needs and challenges. Customization allows for a more targeted and relevant approach to training, maximizing its impact on employee performance and overall business outcomes.

Additionally, leading training and development companies stay at the forefront of technological advancements. They understand the importance of incorporating the latest technology into their solutions to enhance the learning experience. By leveraging technology, these companies make employee training more accessible, engaging, and effective for employees, regardless of their location or learning preferences.

Partnering with a top corporate training company that offers customizable solutions and leverages the latest technology ensures that your employees receive high-quality training that meets business goals.

But how do you choose from the growing list of professional training and coaching companies?

Let’s take a look at the services you should be looking for and how to assess learning and development companies.

We like to Think Outside™ the box

Connect With Us

What services do learning and development companies offer?

Employee training companies offer a range of services designed to enhance the skills, knowledge, and performance of employees within an organization. While each is unique and may specialize in a particular area, these companies typically provide the following services:

  • Off-the-shelf Training: Turn-key training programs easily integrate into your existing LMS so you can launch in a matter of days, not months – or even years.
  • Customized Training: Custom training programs are designed with your organization's goals, culture, and industry requirements in mind, ensuring the content is relevant and effective.
  • Technical and Job-Specific Training: These programs focus on equipping employees with the necessary knowledge and skills to excel in their respective positions.
  • Soft Skills Development: Some training companies have solutions that help employees develop essential interpersonal and professional skills.
  • Onboarding and Orientation: Employee training companies assist organizations in designing comprehensive onboarding and orientation programs for new hires.
  • Assessments and Evaluations: Training companies often provide assessments and evaluations to measure the effectiveness of training programs and identify areas for improvement.
  • Coaching and Mentoring: Many training companies offer coaching and mentoring services to support employee growth and development.
  • Online Learning Platforms: Often, employee training companies provide a skill-building platform that makes corporate training accessible, fun, and effective.

Overall, professional training and coaching companies aim to improve employee performance, enhance productivity, foster professional growth, and ultimately contribute to the success of your business by offering comprehensive training solutions. With their expertise, you can unlock your employees' potential to reshape your organization's future.

Start a conversation

Let's Connect

How to select a learning and development consulting company

Choosing the top corporate training company requires careful consideration and evaluation of several factors. Here are some key steps to help you make an informed decision:

Identify your needs

Clearly define your organization's learning and development needs. Determine the specific areas where you need assistance, whether it's leadership development, job-specific training, onboarding programs, or any other training initiatives. Having a clear understanding of your needs will help you find a training company that specializes in those areas.

Evaluate their expertise

Look for a corporate training partner that has a deep understanding of your industry's trends, challenges, and best practices. Evaluate the qualifications, certifications, and credentials of the consultants and trainers associated with the company. Additionally, ask (1) if they have experience addressing similar problems to yours and (2) if they have any research to support their proposed solution. What do others say about their services?

Review methodology and approach

Review the provider's instructional design approach, teaching methodologies, and content development strategies. For example, how do they determine the best content modality? Does their approach to L&D align with your culture? Do they customize training materials? Training providers should be able to tailor their programs to align with your organization's objectives, culture, and learning preferences.

Assess their technology

In today's digital age, technology plays a pivotal role in corporate training. A robust LMS can enhance the training experience by providing a centralized platform for content delivery, progress tracking, and assessment. Assess the provider's LMS features, usability, and integration capabilities with your existing systems. Ask questions like: What’s the learning experience like on mobile? How does it use AI, if at all? Is gamification incorporated?

Consider reach and scalability

If your organization operates internationally or has a distributed workforce, partner with a learning and development consulting company that can deliver training in multiple languages and is accessible from anywhere. Finally, ask whether their training team is large enough to help your organization scale its L&D efforts as you grow.

Remember to assess professional training and coaching companies carefully, keeping your organization's unique requirements in mind. With the right training partner, you can empower your employees to acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in today's dynamic business environment.

Partner with the top corporate training company

Choosing the right professional training and coaching company is vital to the success of your L&D initiatives.

At Unboxed Training & Technology, our comprehensive training solutions will help you create a tailored learning experience for your team. We understand the needs of each learner are unique and can provide personalized guidance to ensure everyone gets the most out of their training. Plus, our sophisticated skill-building platform, Spoke®, allows you to monitor progress and measure success along the way.

Contact us to learn about our learning and development consulting services and what makes us stand out from other professional training and coaching companies.
